game.name: Remnant Frontier: Survival
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Remnants of humanity send an augmented human to a seemingly uninhabited alien frontier. From sticks and stones, build the tools required to complete the Quantum Gate Terminus and save the world. A relaxed yet deep and engaging Rogue-lite Card Based Adventure; Combine, Explore, Learn & Build.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Remnants of humanity send an augmented human to a seemingly uninhabited alien frontier. From sticks and stones, build the tools required to complete the Quantum Gate Terminus and save the world. A relaxed yet deep and engaging Rogue-lite Card Based Adventure; Combine, Explore, Learn & Build.
